abstract: If your grandmother played the market, she probably invested in utilities for safety and income, not capital gains. She would need to adjust her strategy today.

lead_paragraph: IF your grandmother played the market, she probably invested in utilities for safety and income, not capital gains. She would need to adjust her strategy today.

headline.main: Utility Stocks No Longer Such a Haven
